data.message: Someone has created a fake account in my name and is using my information, and pictures and messaging different people. Can someone please get in contact with me! He is also falsifying about being deployed overseas.  (*PLEASE CONTACT ME*)

replies.message: We're sorry to hear you're experiencing this, Dalton. You can learn how to report someone pretending to be you by following these tips: http://on.fb.me/1QpjeMv. -Rey

Yes, this is happening, as someone broke into my profile and got credit card No. Charged about $300, We immediately call CCCopany and the immediately sent new cards AND  absorbed the charges.  Chase is good card. There was a boy keept showing up ar my blbog and waning tomessage jus with detailsofmywrk and what Watch the blogging carefully.
